intro:
You are trapped on a train that runs forever. 
Find the one different 'YOU' and escape!
description:
The rumored '8 YOUs' has powered up!
Now with multiplayer and score rankings, it's even more fun!

This is an enhanced version of the mini-game '8 YOUs' featured in 'KUUKIYOMI 4: Consider It.'

You are trapped on a train that runs forever. 
What's worse, the train is filled with countless versions of YOU, all looking exactly like YOU... 
Pay close attention and find the one different YOU among the eight, then make your way to the last car and reach the exit!


　[Guide]
　Look closely at all 8 YOUs.
　If just 1 is different, criticize them.
　If not, go forward.
　Pass through 8 cars to get out.


The game modes include 'One Player' and 'Two Players'!
In 'One Player', you can enjoy a score attack as you try to escape on your own.
In 'Two Players', you can race alongside another player to compete for the fastest escape!

Support for score rankings has been added for each game mode.
Score rankings are now available for each stage.
Challenge '8 YOUs' players from around the world based on your scores!

You can add the successfully identified YOU to your 'Collection' with the criticize action!
There are 88 different versions of YOU. 
Aim to complete all the different versions of YOU!

There are 3 stages in total.
Under certain conditions, 2 additional stages will unlock...!

'8 YOUs+' is an enhanced version of the mini-game '8 YOUs' featured in KUUKIYOMI 4: Consider It.
Please be aware that there may be some overlap in game content when purchasing both titles.
